vega.uplink.commanding.gui

Class PorFileComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractFileCommandComponent
      • vega.uplink.commanding.gui.PorFileComponent

  • public class PorFileComponent
extends AbstractFileCommandComponent
    This is a class that provides means for opening an editor (view) for a product stored in a POR file.

      • saveDialog

        public boolean saveDialog(boolean sameDirectory)
        Opens a dialog to save the editor's contents.
        Parameters:
        sameDirectory - if true, the dialog will be shown in the file's directory; if false, it will be opened in its current directory
        Returns:
        true if the file has been saved; false otherwise
